channel.title: glazeruns TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from glazeruns

item.title: UTMB was hard on my feet ##runtok #utmb
item.description: UTMB was hard on my feet ##runtok #utmb

item.title: UTMB was super hard this year and I loved it. 5th time running it. it never gets easier, but it's always a dream. I think it's the hardest 100 miler out there. Smile,.or you're doing it wrong #utmb #runtok #Ultrarunner
item.description: UTMB was super hard this year and I loved it. 5th time running it. it never gets easier, but it's always a dream. I think it's the hardest 100 miler out there. Smile,.or you're doing it wrong #utmb #runtok #Ultrarunner

item.title: The shoes held up well. Despite the extremely rocky terrain at UTMB, all lugs survived. Just a little dirty. I'll still run another 300 training miles on them. But I need a new pair for Run Rabbit Run 100 in 12 days. These are Hoka Challengers 7s. No, I d
item.description: The shoes held up well. Despite the extremely rocky terrain at UTMB, all lugs survived. Just a little dirty. I'll still run another 300 training miles on them. But I need a new pair for Run Rabbit Run 100 in 12 days. These are Hoka Challengers 7s. No, I d

item.title: Exciting news: @Lauren Glaze and I are gearing up to run the NYC Marathon in just two months! After Lauren's surgery and some time off, we’re finally ready to hit the pavement again. It hasn’t been an easy journey back to consistency, but we’re embracing
item.description: Exciting news: @Lauren Glaze and I are gearing up to run the NYC Marathon in just two months! After Lauren's surgery and some time off, we’re finally ready to hit the pavement again. It hasn’t been an easy journey back to consistency, but we’re embracing

item.title: Day 2 of @Lauren Glaze 's NYC Marathon training here in Florence, Italy, is done, and it went really well! After battling the European summer heat, tonight’s cooler air was a nice break. That heat is no joke, but Lauren felt much better today—day one is
item.description: Day 2 of @Lauren Glaze 's NYC Marathon training here in Florence, Italy, is done, and it went really well! After battling the European summer heat, tonight’s cooler air was a nice break. That heat is no joke, but Lauren felt much better today—day one is

item.title: Maybe the French word for buckle is vest? Just like pain is bread. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #ultramarathon #utmb
item.description: Maybe the French word for buckle is vest? Just like pain is bread. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #ultramarathon #utmb

item.title: Guess I figured out my limits #runtok

item.title: Failure is one of the greatest teachers we have. It’s easy to celebrate success, but it's in our failures where the real growth happens. Every setback is a chance to learn, adjust, and come back stronger. In running, and in life, you’re never truly defeat
item.description: Failure is one of the greatest teachers we have. It’s easy to celebrate success, but it's in our failures where the real growth happens. Every setback is a chance to learn, adjust, and come back stronger. In running, and in life, you’re never truly defeat

item.title: Does anyone else get a little sad when they have to retire gear? This watch has been with me through some of the toughest races, covering thousands of miles in every type of weather. It’s seen mountain summits and been the first thing I check (and snap a

item.title: When you're married to an ultrarunner, things you might have to do will test that "for worse" statement. If anyone doubted how much my wife loves me, I have video proof. Kt tape is my duct tape, I use it for everything. Nipple chaffing, friction reduction
item.description: When you're married to an ultrarunner, things you might have to do will test that "for worse" statement. If anyone doubted how much my wife loves me, I have video proof. Kt tape is my duct tape, I use it for everything. Nipple chaffing, friction reduction

item.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
item.description: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
